product_name: SealLine Kodiak Window Purge Dry Bag - 15 Liters
long_description: It's been a long paddle. Are your delicious snacks easily accessible? Find out with a quick glimpse into the frosted window of the SealLine Kodiak Window dry bag. Made of PVC-free, polyurethane-coated nylon, this bag stands up to rough treatment. Translucent urethane window helps you easily locate interior items. Flush, flexible design reduces snags; 1-way purge valve removes excess air. Round bottom maximizes storage capacity; when filled, bag stands upright and offers easy access. Heavy-duty, thermoplastic urethane bottom extends durability. Watertight roll closure seals the bag quickly and easily.
short_description: It's been a long paddle. Are your delicious snacks easily accessible? Find out with a quick glimpse into the frosted window of the SealLine Kodiak Window dry bag.
